author: CMSTrackerDPG
body:
This PR revamps the SiStrip Calibration common framework. It also slightly changes the ALCARECO workflow to be more DRY and have overlapping code for PCL and standalone calibration workflows.

I also added several [unit tests](https://github.com/CMSTrackerDPG/cmssw/blob/newStripSW_v2/CalibTracker/SiStripCommon/test/run_tests.sh) to check in the IBs whether some upstream code changes may break our code and act promptly. Would it be possible to add this script to the jenkins stack?

Interested people: @dimattia @jlagram
title: SiStrip Calibration common framework revamp
